name: MLA ASSOCIATES ON BEHALF OF BRAINSCOPE COMPANY
sampleDescriptions: Medical technology in both the National Defense Authorization Act for FY2022 and the not yet introduced National Defense Authorization Act for FY2023.
Medical technology in the National Defense Authorization Act for FY2022, the National Defense Authorization Act for FY2023, and the Defense Appropriations Act for Fiscal Year 2023.
National Defense Authorization Act for FY2023; issues related to Defense health and medical technology.
